meanings.definition: Plankings: The act of covering a surface with planks.
meanings.sent1: The plankings on the deck made it look neat and tidy.
meanings.sent2: The carpenters finished the plankings on the wall before painting.
meanings.sent3: The plankings on the ceiling started a conversation about home decor.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity soared as she envisioned the plankings as a canvas for art.
meanings.sent5: The plankings creaked softly under our feet, adding charm to the room.

meanings.definition: Plankings: Wooden boards used for flooring or construction.
meanings.sent1: The old house had sturdy plankings that had stood the test of time.
meanings.sent2: The builders unloaded the new plankings for the renovation project.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loved to hide under the plankings and surprise us.
meanings.sent4: The plankings formed a solid foundation for the new structure to rise upon.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh wood filled the room as the plankings were installed.
